ygData.subject: faction with FP rogues
ygData.msgSnippet: i THINK that giving 4 orc pawn picks to one of the merchants at habard s resales in east fp will raise faction with numerous FP groups, with no decreases.. but
ygData.messageBody:
i THINK that giving 4 orc pawn picks to one of the merchants at habard's
resales in east fp will raise faction with numerous FP groups, with no
decreases.. but i dont remember at this point whether the rogues are among
them. worth a try, anyway. by doing so you also get a lottery ticket from
highpass, which will randomly be a winning number that could result in
something interesting, but nobody is quite sure yet..

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
